text: Hello would you like to help and donate to Save the Children.
yes.i think it is a worthwhile charity
It really is I think it is great that they help provide healthcare for people in poor countries
yes.we have an obligation to help the less fortunate
I feel the same especially when it is for children I feel we need to do what we can to help them.
yes.they are the future as the old saying goes.in helping them  we in some small way try to build a better tomorrow
I like the way you think. We are very similar.
thank you. we do seem to be on the same page
I am always willing to help someone if I know it will benefit them
i always try to be there for others.perhaps someday when i need help,someone will be there for me
That is a great attitude to have.
it is the golden rule or at least my version of it
What amount would you be willing to donate
things are a little tight for me right now bu i could do $15.
Any amount helps and it all goes to the kids so that is a great amount
great.i hope it can make a difference in childrens' lives
I think it will help a lot.
i shouldn't care but how does my donation compare to others? am i giving less or more do you know?
I think that has been the average. People have been giving what they can and have been very helpful.
great. i shouldn't care but human nature compelled me to ask
It was a good question. Well your donation will definitely help
how much are ou giving?
the same
